resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107532</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107532</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085998</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Style</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estilo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύφος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estilo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Style, the fourth Feature of Effective Writing, is what makes an author's writing unique. Here's how to help your students establish a style appropriate to different genres and audiences.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Art, das vierte Merkmal des wirkungsvollen 
Schreibens, ist, was das Schreiben eines Autors eindeutig bildet. Ist 
hier, wie man Ihren Kursteilnehmern hilft, eine Art 
herzustellen, die zu den unterschiedlichen Genren und zu den Publikum 
passend ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le modèle, le quatrième dispositif de l'écriture
pertinente, est ce qui rend l'écriture d'un auteur seule. Voici 
comment aider vos étudiants à établir un modèle approprié 
à différents genres et assistances.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estilo, a quarta característica da escrita 
eficaz, é o que faz a escrita de um autor original. É aqui 
como ajudar a seus estudantes estabelecer um estilo apropriado aos 
genres e às audiências diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo stile, la caratteristica di quarto di 
scrittura efficace, è che cosa rende la scrittura dell'autore unica. 
Qui è come aiutare i vostri allievi a stabilire uno stile 
adatto ai generi differenti ed ai pubblici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ύφος, το τέταρτο χαρακτηριστικό γνώρισμα του 
αποτελεσματικού γραψίματος, είναι τι καθιστά το γράψιμο ενός 
συντάκτη μοναδικό. Εδώ πώς να βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές σας
να καθιερώσουν ένα ύφος κατάλληλο για τα διαφορετικά ύφη και τα 
ακροατήρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El estilo, la cuarta característica de la 
escritura eficaz, es qué hace la escritura de un autor única. 
Aquí es cómo ayudar a sus estudiantes a establecer un estilo 
apropiado a diversos géneros y a las audiencias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHLEEN CALI
FN:KATHLEEN CALI
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085998</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107532</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/style</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
